name: Himchan
dialog: P_name, hello! You came for some exercise, huh?

name: 주인공
dialog: I knew I'd find Himchan here at the sports field. Himchan, how about exercising together?

name: Himchan
dialog: I'm planning to do hula hooping, would you like to join me?

name: 주인공
dialog: Hula hoop? I've never tried hula hooping before.

name: Himchan
dialog: You'll get hooked on hula hooping once you try it today. Haha! Alright, let me teach you how to hula hoop. Follow me. First, place the hula hoop on the ground. Go ahead!

name: 주인공
dialog: Place the hula hoop on the ground!

name: Himchan
dialog: Once the hula hoop is flat on the ground, step into it, and then pick it up, keeping your hands shoulder-width apart. Like this!

name: Himchan
dialog: Next, hold the hoop with both hands on either side and bring it up to your waist, letting it rest on one side of your torso.

name: Himchan
dialog: Then, start spinning your waist to make the hula hoop go round and round.
비고: [훌라후프 모션, 근데 주인공은 2번 정도 떨어뜨리다가 잘하기]

name: Himchan
dialog: Hold on a moment! At first, the hula hoop might keep falling to the ground. When that happens, just pick it up and keep spinning. As you get used to the movement, you'll even learn the trick to lift it back up when it starts to drop, haha!

name: Himchan
dialog: P_name, how was it? What do you think about trying hula hooping?

name: 주인공
dialog: It was a bit challenging at first, but I think I can get the hang of it with practice.

name: Himchan
dialog: Good! Keep that confidence and practice regularly. You might become a hula hooping pro! Well, that's it for today! Exercise complete~!
